mapper.select: select * from user where userId = #{userId} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into user (userId, password, username, phone, address) values(#{userId}, #{password}, #{username}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.update: update user set userId = #{userId}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address} where username = #{username}
update user set money = #{money} where userId = #{userId}
